video.title: Being Human
video.synopsis: Trying to fit into modern society is a vexing, often impossible task for a genius werewolf, a flighty ghost and a suave vampire who share a household.

episodes.synopsis: Things seem to be looking up for our three heroes. But it's not long before their supernatural conditions catch up with them.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: George is shocked when he meets another werewolf, a rough and ready rogue called Tully.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Annie meets Gilbert, a ghost from the 80s, who loves being stuck in the past. He's a ghoulish Smiths fan and loves the bleakness of being a ghost.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell's attempt to embrace humanity becomes more intense than ever when he befriends a 12 year old boy, Bernie, and his divorced mum, Fleur.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Herrick has convinced Mitchell that the vampires are starting a mass conversion and that they will only feed from people who want to be vampires.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell's life is saved when Josie, an old lover of his who is dying at the hospital, offers to give her blood to save his life.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell realises that vampire society is in complete disarray following the death of Herrick - and it's about to implode.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Annie thinks she's met the man of her dreams, a human called Saul. But Saul is not all he seems and the only date he is interested in is with Death.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell becomes the reluctant leader of the vampires in an attempt to contain their increasingly random killings.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: George embraces normality in a desperate attempt to contain the wolf. He gets a new job, a new girlfriend, and even a cage to transform in.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: We learn how Mitchell came to turn his back on killing in the past. And in the present how he's struggling to contain that same desire and need.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Annie gets a job working with a stage psychic and finds a new sense of purpose by helping ghosts resolve their issues with their living relatives.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell is Back in Black when he discovers the truth about Lucy and the vampire massacre. He and Daisy swear revenge, in style.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: It's the final showdown at Kemp and Jaggat's facility. Will Mitchell save his friends from Jaggat's macabre experiments?
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Having fled their lives in Bristol, our supernatural heroes find themselves in Wales looking for a safe haven.
episodes.title: Lia

episodes.synopsis: In the hospital George and Nina are confronted by Adam, a teenage vampire, lapping at the vein of one of Nina's patients.
episodes.title: Adam's Family

episodes.synopsis: Annie is accosted by mouthy 'it girl' Sasha. But Sasha isn't any kind of supernatural our heroes have encountered before - she's a zombie!
episodes.title: Type Four

episodes.synopsis: Nina fears the worst for her pregnancy, since the baby was conceived whilst she and George were transformed as werewolves.
episodes.title: The Pack

episodes.synopsis: Things get a whole lot worse for our heroes when erstwhile nemesis Herrick turns up in the local hospital.
episodes.title: The Longest Day

episodes.synopsis: George is saddened to learn that his father, also called George, has died. He attends the funeral, hiding out of sight.
episodes.title: Daddy Ghoul

episodes.synopsis: The net closes in on Mitchell when Detective Nancy Reid questions him about his involvement in the Box Tunnel Massacre.
episodes.title: Though the Heavens Fall

episodes.synopsis: Herrick rescues Mitchell from prison. Mitchell says that he'll side with Herrick, if it guarantees his continued survival.
episodes.title: The Wolf Shaped Bullet

episodes.synopsis: In an old bed-and-breakfast in a sleepy seaside town, we join Annie, her housemate George and their new friend Tom.
episodes.title: Eve of the War

episodes.synopsis: Hal, Leo and Pearl -- another vampire, werewolf and ghost -- turn up at the house on a pilgrimage to visit the baby Saviour.
episodes.title: Being Human 1955

episodes.synopsis: Hal has sheltered himself from society to avoid the risk of killing. So when Annie and Tom tell him he needs to get a job, he's filled with dread.
episodes.title: The Graveyard Shift

episodes.synopsis: Annie, Hal and Tom are like a ring of steel protecting baby Eve, so when a ghost from the 1970s calls at the house, they're immediately suspicious.
episodes.title: A Spectre Calls

episodes.synopsis: Teenage vampire Adam is madly in love with no-nonsense head teacher Yvonne, much to the dismay of our heroes, who see the relationship as a scandal.
episodes.title: Hold the Front Page

episodes.synopsis: Romance is in the air for Tom when Allison, a geeky teen werewolf, turns up looking for help.
episodes.title: Puppy Love

episodes.synopsis: Tensions run high when Cutler takes Tom under his wing. Hal's wicked past catches up with him and he finds himself led down a path of temptation.
episodes.title: Making History

episodes.synopsis: The Old Ones have arrived and are intent on taking over the world by force. Cutler has other plans, but they go awry.
episodes.title: The War Child

episodes.synopsis: Hal, Tom and Alex are three housemates with some issues on their hands. Hal is a vampire, Tom is a werewolf and Alex has recently become a ghost.
episodes.title: The Trinity

episodes.synopsis: Alex is scared. The house is haunted, and not just by her. Hal and Tom are desperate to win the Employee of the Month competition at the hotel.
episodes.title: Sticks and Rope

episodes.synopsis: Tom sees a chance to learn from a master werewolf who also happens to be an untrustworthy slimeball.
episodes.title: Pie and Prejudice

episodes.synopsis: While Rook's away, he needs the Honolulu Heights residents to look after his special charge, naive and socially awkward werewolf Bobby.
episodes.title: The Greater Good

episodes.synopsis: Tom falls head over heels in lust with Natasha. She needs a job and Tom needs her close, so it's a match made in heaven.
episodes.title: No Care, All Responsibility

episodes.synopsis: There is little left of Hal's humanity. Having feasted on blood and recruited an army of vampires, he's ready to return to his hedonistic ways.
episodes.title: The Last Broadcast
